str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the original form of tlao; a balance, i.e. a certain weight or 'talent'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To gain, acquire, win (over), avoid loss. From kerdos; to gain.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
